text: <@U025EJ42PMF> <@UD53A9UUR> I'm getting into the "digital garden" style of sharing ideas while they are still in progress. The blog post is at about 30% but it covers enough to get started. Any feedback would be much appreciated. Here's the post: <https://fasterbetter.dev/HubSpot-and-webpack>

:beta: Hey all! I’m happy to announce that child theme creation is now supported in the design manager and is in open beta. If you would like to try out the new feature please send me a direct message with your account ID. Highlights include:
• easy to use setup wizard
• copy of theme settings on child theme creation
Hey, do you think string-replace-loader could be used to wrap all css in {% raw %} HubL tags?
thanks, need to try that out :+1:
